title: A Manhunt in India Left 27 Million People Without Mobile Internet
description: Authorities ordered Twitter accounts blocked and the internet shut down as they hunt for Sikh separatist Amritpal Singh Sandhu.

title: How Good Smile, a Major Toy Company, Kept 4chan Online
description: Documents obtained by WIRED confirm that Good Smile, which licenses toy production for Disney, was an investor in the controversial image board.

title: In Sudden Alarm, Tech Doyens Call for a Pause on ChatGPT
description: Tech luminaries, renowned scientists, and Elon Musk warn of an “out-of-control race” to develop and deploy ever-more-powerful AI systems.
